Can you fix windows 7 deep ambition?
cant make usb bootable disk it says this iso is wrong/damaged

Cluv32 heres how to make a usb bootable

1. download windows 7 iso
2. Download universal usb installer (http://www.pendrivelinux.com/universal-usb-installer-easy-as-1-2-3/
3. open usb installer and browse for iso file
4. select os to burn to usb ( in your case windows 7)
5. Select the usb stick you want to use 
6. click Finish

Hope this helps Simplest Method for doing it i Know
